data.lyric:
[ti:The Motion (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Care Package (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Motion (Explicit) - Drake
[00:04.16]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham
[00:08.32]Composed by：Aubrey Graham
[00:12.48]It's not me and you it's not me it's you
[00:15.24]You're reckless and you know it they don't love you like I do
[00:18.32]Say you're moving on well I guess that's just the motion
[00:22.88]I guess that's just the motion
[00:26.80]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[00:32.86]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[00:39.25]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[00:48.55]I don't have a f**k to give I've been moving state to state
[00:51.47]In my leather and my Timbs like it's 1998
[00:54.67]And my dog Chubby Chub that's my n***a from the way
[00:57.51]On the Eastside of the city that's where everybody stay
[01:00.59]Seem like everybody calling 'cause they want me on their song
[01:03.74]It's like every time I touch it I could never do no wrong
[01:06.81]When they need a favor from you man they don't leave you alone
[01:11.23]But I guess that's just the motion yeah
[01:15.78]Then their phone doesn't ring
[01:17.28]When they got everything that's the motion
[01:21.54]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[01:28.00]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[01:35.80]Yeah looking back on it at least my pride is intact
[01:40.27]'Cause we said no strings attached and I still got tied up in that
[01:43.24]Everything that I write is either for her or about her
[01:46.38]So I'm with her even when I'm here without her and she know it
[01:49.42]The girl that I wanna save is like a danger to my health
[01:52.63]Try being with somebody that wanna be somebody else
[01:55.61]I always thought she was perfect when she was being herself
[01:58.53]Don't even know how to help but I guess that's just the motion yeah
[02:04.62]She'll probably come around
[02:06.20]Soon as I settle down that's the motion
[02:10.26]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:16.77]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:23.38]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:26.81]Nothing less and nothing more
[02:29.21]I hear your heart hit the floor
[02:30.40]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:32.68]Talking to you is not enough no
[02:34.45]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:41.14]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:48.95]I guess that's just the motion
[02:53.25]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[02:59.37]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[03:05.47]Oh-oh I guess that's just the motion
[03:39.33]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:The Motion (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Care Package (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.16]//
[00:08.32]//
[00:12.48]我们就此别过 错不在我 是你造成如今的局面
[00:15.24]你总是鲁莽行事 你心知肚明 他们不会像我一样爱你
[00:18.32]你说整理好心情 继续前行 好吧 我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[00:22.88]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[00:26.80]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[00:32.86]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[00:39.25]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[00:48.55]我为你付出了一切 我四处漂泊 居无定所
[00:51.47]穿着我的皮衣和Timberland靴子 就像1998年的时髦打扮
[00:54.67]我的挚友Chubby Chub 就是我以前在多伦多的兄弟
[00:57.51]在这座城市的东边 我们都住在那里
[01:00.59]好像大家都在呼唤我 因为他们想跟我合作
[01:03.74]仿佛只要有我的参与 这些歌就一定能热销
[01:06.81]当他们需要你的帮助时 他们会迫不及待地联系你
[01:11.23]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[01:15.78]随后他们就不会再打来
[01:17.28]因为他们得到了想要的一切 这就是世间的规律
[01:21.54]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[01:28.00]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[01:35.80]回首过往 至少我的自尊心没有受到伤害
[01:40.27]我们说过彼此只追求刺激与欢愉 可我还是付出了感情 无法自拔
[01:43.24]我写下的每一句歌词要么是为她而写 要么是与她有关
[01:46.38]即使她不在我身边 我也感觉她从未离去 她也知道
[01:49.42]那个我想拯救的女孩 仿佛是对我健康的巨大威胁
[01:52.63]试图和别人在一起 可我不得不冷眼旁观
[01:55.61]我一直觉得 当她做着自己的时候 她真的无可挑剔
[01:58.53]我甚至不知如何伸出援手 我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:04.62]她可能会回心转意
[02:06.20]只要我能尽快安定下来 这就是世间的规律
[02:10.26]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:16.77]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:23.38]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:26.81]没有损失 也未曾获得
[02:29.21]我听见你砰砰的心跳声
[02:30.40]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:32.68]和你聊天绝非我想要的
[02:34.45]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:41.14]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:48.95]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:53.25]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[02:59.37]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[03:05.47]我想这只是世事无常 不可抗拒
[03:39.33]//
